snippet: Sharon Jones and her band, the Dap-Kings, joined other acts on the Daptone Records roster on Thursday for the opener in a three-night stand at the Apollo Theater.
abstract: Jon Pareles reviews performances by Sharon Jones and the Dap-Kings and others at Apollo Theater.
lead_paragraph: Sharon Jones and her band, the Dap-Kings, joined other acts on the Daptone Records roster on Thursday for the opener in a three-night stand at the Apollo Theater.

headline.print_headline: Shimmies and Shouts for a Genre’s Revival
headline.seo: Sharon Jones Headlines Daptone’s Night of Soul
headline.main: Shimmies and Shouts for a Genre’s Revival
